mapper.select: select b.att_no, b.att_name, b.att_content, b.att_startdate, b.att_enddate, b.att_place, b.att_sales, b.att_price, b.att_discountprice, b.att_category, b.att_thumbnail, b.att_photo, (select nvl(round(avg(x.review_star),1), 0) from att_review x where x.att_no = b.att_no) star, (select count(x.review_no) cnt from att_review x where x.att_no = b.att_no) cnt from attraction b where (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate) order by att_no desc

select * from ( select a.*, (select nvl(round(avg(x.review_star),1), 0) from att_review x where x.att_no = a.att_no) star, (select count(x.review_no) cnt from att_review x where x.att_no = a.att_no) cnt from attraction a where att_place like '%' || #{place} || '%' and (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate)
and (replace(att_name, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or replace(att_content, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and att_category like '%' || #{category} || '%'
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{startdate},'YYYY-MM-DD') > att_startdate)
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD') < att_enddate)
) order by att_no desc

select count(*) from ( select a.* from attraction a where att_place like '%' || #{place} || '%' and (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate)
and (replace(att_name, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or replace(att_content, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and att_category like '%' || #{category} || '%'
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{startdate},'YYYY-MM-DD') > att_startdate)
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD') < att_enddate)
) order by att_no desc

select coupon_no no, coupon_quantity quantity, coupon_discountrate discountRate, coupon_startdate startDate, coupon_enddate endDate, coupon_category category, coupon_name name, coupon_issue_date issueDate, coupon_deleted deleted, coupon_issue_end issueEndDate from coupons where coupon_category='즐길거리' and coupon_deleted='n' and coupon_quantity>0 and coupon_issue_end>sysdate
